interestingFact: India is the world's largest democracy and has the second-largest population.
The U.S. has the world's largest economy.
China is the most populous country and home to the Great Wall.
Brazil is home to the Amazon rainforest, the largest in the world.
Australia is the only country that is also a continent.
The UK is made up of England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland.
Canada has the longest international border in the world shared with the U.S.
Germany is known for having the largest economy in Europe.
South Africa has three capital cities — the only country in the world with this system.
